text: The Roewe RX3 is a subcompact crossover manufactured by SAIC's sub brand, Roewe. The RX3 crossover shares the underpinnings with the MG ZS, and is positioned below the compact crossover, the Roewe RX5. ==Gallery== File:Roewe RX3 02.jpg|Roewe RX3 (front) File:Roewe RX3 03.jpg|Roewe RX3 (rear) ==References== ==External links== * Category:2010s cars Category:Cars introduced in 2017 Category:Cars of China Category:Front-wheel-drive vehicles Category:Mini sport utility vehicles RX3
title: Roewe RX3
